channel.title: Coding Steve
channel.description: My Tech and Life Blog with the writing the articles I wish were written!

item.title: Getting Camera Height in Cesium.js - A Complete Guide
item.description: A comprehensive tutorial on how to retrieve and display camera height in Cesium.js, including terrain-relative altitude calculations.

item.title: Multiple OAuth2 Resource Servers with Spring Boot 3.5.0
item.description: How to configure Spring Boot to handle multiple OAuth2 Resource Servers using JwtDecoder based on token issuer

item.title: UV - The Modern Python Package Manager
item.description: Exploring uv, the ultra-fast Python package manager and resolver that's changing how we manage dependencies.

item.title: Spring Data Pagination Serialization Warning
item.description: A short post detailing a common serialization error and the potential solutions

item.title: Dynamically setting audience for using Spring OAuth2 Client
item.description: An article walking through a demo of dynamically setting a query parameter using spring-oauth2-client.

item.title: Casual Machine Performance Test
item.description: Just a fun little comparison of a group of machines and how they handle Java and GraalVM native images.

item.title: Spring Version Compatibility Cheatsheet
item.description: A continuously updated page for easy reference!

item.title: Hibernate 6.6 Breaking Changes - StaleObjectStateException
item.description: Spring Boot's update to Hibernate 6.6 brings with it a breaking change that could silently cause issues in projects using it.

item.title: Spring Cloud Stream's Record Recoverable Processor
item.description: An example using the new RecordRecoverableProcessor class in Spring Cloud Streams for highly configurable error handling.

item.title: Cesium JS Volume 2 - Drawing a Circle w/ Primitives & Entities
item.description: The second post about basic CesumJS components!

item.title: Cesium JS Volume 1 - Drawing a Rectangle w/ Primitives & Entities
item.description: The first of a series of posts about basic CeisumJS components!

item.title: Jdk 23 Streams - How To Use Gather Operations
item.description: An article on how to use the Gather stream operation in JDK23

item.title: Easy Spring Rest Client w/ OAuth2
item.description: Using the new Spring RestClient with newly supported OAuth2 capabilities!

item.title: Homelab Drives & Buying Used
item.description: An article with a short overview of my experiece buying used drives and using smartctl.

item.title: Partitioning Tables with Progress
item.description: An article walking through a demo of partitioning tables with postgres.

item.title: GraalVM Native Image Reflect Config Demystified
item.description: This post digs into the native-image configurations, specifically the reflect-config.json!.

item.title: Logging Request Body with Spring WebClient
item.description: An article describing the latest way to log spring web client requests and responses using Logbook.

item.title: Converting Spring Boot 2 to Spring Boot 3 Native Image w/ GraalVM
item.description: A walkthrough of updating a Spring Boot 2 application to Spring 3 running on GraalVM as a native application.

item.title: Freedom of Travel for the Three Legged Cat
item.description: My first blog post, describing the original Jekyll blog and a migration to Astro.

item.title: My First Post, on My First Blog
item.description: My first blog post, describing the original Jekyll blog and a migration to Astro.
